mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_activity_node_service_state (id,activity_id,service_name,owner_app,state,tenant_id,env_code) VALUES (#{id},#{activityId},#{serviceName},#{ownerApp},#{state},#{tenantId},#{envCode}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE state = #{state}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM t_activity_node_service_state WHERE activity_id = #{activityId} AND owner_app = #{ownerApp}
